publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2389 Mr Lloyd Quinan: Centrally Held Informationâ€”That the Parliament denounces the unhelpful and often overused answer to parliamentary questions by the Scottish Executive that "This information is not held centrally" and urges the Executive to provide its departments with the means of gathering the information necessary to ensure that answers to parliamentary questions are substantive. Supported by: Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Alex Neil*
S1M-2389 Centrally Held Information (lodged on 31 October 2001) Stewart Stevenson*, Michael Matheson*, Fiona McLeod*
